name: Cornerstone Software
overview: Cornerstone Software, Inc. develops, markets, and sells lease accounting and asset management software. It offers EaglePro, an asset-based lease accounting software solution. The company also provides application development tools, which include RSOM-Remote Server Object Model for e-commerce and e-business on-line transaction processing; and Piccolo, a message oriented middleware that connects application components. In addition, it offers consulting, installation, training, and application development services. Cornerstone Software offers its products through distributors, value-added resellers, and direct marketing. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Nashua, New Hampshire.
